1011010110101101 1101000011101001 1 -> sum: 1000011010010111, cout: 1
0111110000110010 0000101001110011 1 -> sum: 1000011010100110, cout: 0

1000011111000011 1111101100001010 0 -> sum: 1000001011001101, cout: 1

1010000001101100 1000110010101101 1 -> sum: 0010110100011010, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
